name: Grimm's Not-So-Fairy Tale
description:
[Note: If you feel soft-locked in the maze, you probably are due to bugs. Download the game for a more stable experience, if possible.]

A *very* buggy top down 2d shooter(?) detailing the adventure of Grimm Patches as he seeks to save himself from the PumpKing's evil curse.

This game was built for the "Dark Room" game jam by a small team of amateur artists, devs and Sophia.

This game has *many* known bugs, some of which are game breaking. Consider part of the gameplay to be avoiding these! It's a feature, promise.
